Really? That's cool. I just don't know how that would work given that your funds are stored in an L2 wallet that exists inside the state tree of the roll-up, so I would think withdrawing would necessarily change the roll-up stateroot, thus requiring a validity proof.

Do you know how oracles would work inside a roll-up? I suppose you would only be submitting an L2 tx for each update..
